name: Simple Sushi Rolls
description: A beginner-friendly sushi roll with fresh vegetables and seasoned rice wrapped in nori.
instructions: Rinse the sushi rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
Cook the rice according to package instructions, then let it cool slightly.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt into the warm rice to season it.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat, shiny side down.
Spread a thin layer of seasoned rice evenly over the nori, leaving about 2 cm at the top edge.
Arrange cucumber, avocado, and carrots in a line across the center of the rice.
Using the mat, tightly roll the sushi away from you, sealing the edge with a bit of water.
Slice the roll into 6â€“8 pieces with a sharp knife.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
